I remember my first one-to-one with Jackie B. Cooper like it was yesterday. This man averaged selling 52 vehicles a month for over 3 years in the small town of Woodruff, South Carolina, with a population of just 5,000! In his renowned automotive training, Jackie never aimed to change what salespeople were already doing. Instead, he sought to complement their existing methods, whether through audio, video, or live stage performances. His goal was simple: make salespeople laugh and learn. Jackie B.
